pages.title: Casting
pages.text: Casting is a mage's core skill. Hold a $(key)casting item$() to cast spells. Common $(key)casting items$() include $(bold)wands, staves, swords, and other weapons$().$(br2)Which spells you can cast depends on your $(key)spell pool$(), determined by your held item and equipped $(mage/book)spell book$().
